epoch.description: the epoch(time peroid) of the asteroid

orbitAxis.description: the axis of the orbit from the asteroid in astronomical units(au)

orbitEccentricity.description: the eccentricity of the orbit from the asteroid

orbitInclination.description: The inclination of the orbit from the asteroid in degrees

perihelionArgument.description: the perihelion argument of the asteroid in degrees which is used to calculate the trajectory

nodeLongitude.description: the node longitude of the asteroid in degrees

meanAnomaly.description: The mean anomaly of the asteroid in degrees.

perihelionDistance.description: The perihelion distance of the asteroid in astronomical units
